name: Minoria Official Soundtrack
short_description: The complete soundtrack to Minoria. Includes Side NUN: Official Soundtrack and Side WITCH: Extras. Features 39 tracks in total.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
